input.sentences: christmas celebrations were in full gear .
the streets were decorated and people were out enjoying the holiday season .
there were ice sculptures to look at on the side of the road .
there was even a chance to meet [male] !
output.sentences: The Christmas festival had finally come to the small town.
People were gathering to listen to the choir.
The community shared food and drink in the spirit of Christmas.
Community members dressed in costumes to delight the area children.
